record.title: ORDER FOR READING OF WASHINGTON'S FAREWELL ADDRESS
record.narrative:
ORDER FOR READING OF WASHINGTON'S FAREWELL ADDRESS -- (Senate - February 04, 2008)

[Page: S612]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that notwithstanding the resolution of the Senate of January 24, 1901, the traditional reading of Washington's Farewell Address take place on Monday, February 25, 2008, at a time to be determined by the majority leader, in consultation with the Republican leader.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
